Here is the version 3.42.0 of Argo user’s manual [https://dx.doi.org/10.13155/29825](https://dx.doi.org/10.13155/29825){target="_blank"}

It includes 12 changes:

- §2.2.1 optional global attribute “id” contains “Argo GDAC DOI”
Argo GDAC data DOI global attribute is optional and recommended
[https://github.com/nvs-vocabs/ArgoVocabs/issues/43](https://github.com/nvs-vocabs/ArgoVocabs/issues/43){target="_blank"} and [https://github.com/OneArgo/ADMT/issues/72](https://github.com/OneArgo/ADMT/issues/72){target="_blank"} 

- Throughout the document: added links to individual Reference tables in the NVS

- §2.2.4 §2.3.4 §2.4.4 PI_NAME has a controlled vocabulary
[https://github.com/OneArgo/ArgoVocabs/issues/6](https://github.com/OneArgo/ArgoVocabs/issues/6){target="_blank"}

- §2.4.7.1.1 Float sensor status within Argo program
[https://github.com/OneArgo/ArgoVocabs/issues/76](https://github.com/OneArgo/ArgoVocabs/issues/76){target="_blank"} 

- §2.4.7.1 SENSOR_FIRMWARE_VERSION
[https://github.com/OneArgo/ArgoVocabs/issues/55](https://github.com/OneArgo/ArgoVocabs/issues/55){target="_blank"} 

- §2.4.5 deployment_platform dimension extended to string128 [https://github.com/OneArgo/ArgoVocabs/issues/2#issuecomment-2437421119](https://github.com/OneArgo/ArgoVocabs/issues/2#issuecomment-2437421119){target="_blank"} 

- §3.1 add “Argo auxiliary meta-data” data type

- §3.2.1: add a comment to provide examples when *_qc= ‘ ‘ can occur as per [https://github.com/OneArgo/ArgoVocabs/issues/21](https://github.com/OneArgo/ArgoVocabs/issues/21){target="_blank"} 

- §3.22 … §3.28: remove the remaining tyinurl

- §3.11 change from grey list to supplemental sensor exclusion list in reference table 11
[https://github.com/OneArgo/ADMT/discussions/70](https://github.com/OneArgo/ADMT/discussions/70){target="_blank"}

- §3.33 add PI_NAME reference table

- §6.2 remove greylist paragraph, the sensor exclusion list (greylist) management is internal, documented in the Quality control manual.
[https://github.com/OneArgo/ADMT/discussions/70](https://github.com/OneArgo/ADMT/discussions/70){target="_blank"}
